item.title: About Me
item.description: About me I’m Ramsay, I chase a lot of different things. The slogan of this site is In pursuit of Hubris, since: There are three great virtues of a programmer; Laziness, Impatience and Hubris – Larry Wall The first programming language I learned is `Pascal` in a computer-hobbyist group when I was a middle school student. Back to time before, the only thing I could do with `Pascal` was trying to find the maximum or minimum number among the number array, or just calculate the sum of them, which is of less fun.

item.title: 天朝的崩溃
item.description: 1 天朝的崩溃 1.1 前言 历史教科书说，与英国的第一次鸦片战争，敲开了清朝的大门，清朝也因此和外国签定了一系列不平等条约；而因为清朝的落伍，导致清朝
